<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_email"><sys_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><blind_copied/><body><html><head><style>
	#snc_notification_preference {
		text-decoration: none;
	}
	
	#snc_notification_unsubscribe {
		text-decoration: none;

</style>

</head><body><p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">Hello <strong>Networking Operations Team!</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">A new <strong>Critical Priority Network Incident</strong> was c</span><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">reated on <strong>2025-08-01 10:05:27 UTC.</strong></span></span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">Currently the&nbsp;<strong>State</strong> is<strong> </strong>New<strong>&nbsp;</strong>and&nbsp;<strong>Category&nbsp;</strong>is Network.</span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<ol style="list-style-position: inside; list-style-type: upper-alpha;">
<li style="font-size: 12pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><strong>Priority</strong>: 1 - Critical<br></span></li>
<li style="font-size: 12pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><strong>Impact</strong>: 1 - High</span></li>
<li style="font-size: 12pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><strong>Urgency</strong>: 1 - High</span></li>
</ol>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><strong>Caller</strong></span>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">Zane Sulikowski, , zane.sulikowski@example.com, Frankfurt</span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="text-decoration: underline; font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica;"><strong><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-decoration: underline;">Description</span></strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">We had an upset driver come in today to voice their concerns about receiving the wrong directions through our app. Seems like our app is misreading their gps location or their location value is assigned to an outdated coordinate. Best of luck, they said they will take a break until the issue is fixed. </span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">--------------------------------------------</span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">Thank you for your timely attention to this matter. </span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">We appreciate your contributions towards improving Uber!</span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">Sincerely,</span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><strong>Uber IT Ops Team</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><img src="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/c/cc/Uber_logo_2018.png" alt="File:Uber logo 2018.png - Wikimedia Commons" width="83" height="29"></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<br><br>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_email_aa398ad29f4722107f4424482024abb3
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_email"><sys_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><blind_copied/><body><html><head><style>
	#snc_notification_preference {
		text-decoration: none;
	}
	
	#snc_notification_unsubscribe {
		text-decoration: none;
	}
</style>

</head><body><p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Roboto Mono', monospace; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">Hello Networking Operations Team,</span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Roboto Mono', monospace; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">A new <strong>Critical Priority Network Incident</strong> was c</span><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Roboto Mono', monospace; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">reated on <strong>2025-08-01 09:44:08 UTC</strong> by </span><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Roboto Mono', monospace; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><strong>admin</strong>.</span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Roboto Mono', monospace; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">Currently the&nbsp;<strong>State</strong> is <strong>New&nbsp;</strong>and&nbsp;<strong>Category&nbsp;</strong>is Network.</span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Roboto Mono', monospace; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><strong>Priority</strong>: 1 - Critical | </span><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Roboto Mono', monospace; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><strong>Impact</strong>: 1 - High | </span><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Roboto Mono', monospace; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><strong>Urgency</strong>: 1 - High</span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><strong><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Roboto Mono', monospace; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-decoration: underline;">Description</span></strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Roboto Mono', monospace; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">Hey, I'm working in the maps division and we seem to lost connection to our geolocation data hosts. </span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Roboto Mono', monospace; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">--------------------------------------------</span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Roboto Mono', monospace; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">Thank you for your timely attention to this matter. </span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Roboto Mono', monospace; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">We appreciate your contributions towards improving Uber!</span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Roboto Mono', monospace; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">Sincerely,</span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: 'Roboto Mono', monospace; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><strong>Uber IT Ops Team</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<br><br>

<a id="snc_notification_unsubscribe" href="mailto:?subject=Unsubscribe from &quot;Critical Priority Incident Notification&quot;&amp;body=Sending this email with the predefined content in the subject and body will unsubscribe you from the notification &quot;Critical Priority Incident Notification&quot;%0D%0A%0D%0AUnsubscribe:{&quot;id&quot;:&quot;52c120ceb81622107f44046e3758c0da&quot;,&quot;token&quot;:&quot;c797e62132&quot;}">Unsubscribe</a> | <a id="snc_notification_preference" href="https://kura-labs-jul-4728-0019.lab.service-now.com/nav_to.do?uri=notification_preferences.do%3Fsysparm_notification=52c120ceb81622107f44046e3758c0da">Notification Preferences</a><div>&nbsp;</div><div style="display:inline">Ref:MSG0000657_TmyE70CiHecPAGyjGKbr</div></body></html></body><body_text/><checkpoint>0</checkpoint><content_type>text/html</content_type><copied/><deleted>false</deleted><direct>brendan.qin@example.com,brice.hedglin@example.com,bradly.hasselvander@example.com,alyssa.biasotti@example.com,alva.pennigton@example.com,amelia.caputo@example.com,brent.vaidya@example.com,brant.darnel@example.com,jacklyn.emayo@example.com,amos.linnan@example.com,karla.ken@example.com</direct><error_string/><headers>X-ServiceNow-Source:Notification-52c120ceb81622107f44046e3758c0da

</headers><importance>high</importance><instance>2cc84ade9f0722107f4424482024abff</instance><mailbox display_value="Outbox">outbox</mailbox><message_id/><notification_type>SMTP</notification_type><receive_type>new</receive_type><recipients>brendan.qin@example.com,brice.hedglin@example.com,bradly.hasselvander@example.com,alyssa.biasotti@example.com,alva.pennigton@example.com,amelia.caputo@example.com,brent.vaidya@example.com,brant.darnel@example.com,jacklyn.emayo@example.com,amos.linnan@example.com,karla.ken@example.com</recipients><reply_to/><state>ready</state><status/><subject>New Critical Network Incident INC0010002: Potential Network Outage in Maps</subject><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-01 09:44:15</sys_created_on><sys_id>aa398ad29f4722107f4424482024abb3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-01 09:44:15</sys_updated_on><target_table>incident</target_table><type>send-ready</type><uid>N/A</uid><user>admin@example.com</user><user_id/><weight>0</weight></sys_email></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_email"><sys_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><blind_copied/><body><html><head><style>
	#snc_notification_preference {
		text-decoration: none;
	}
	
	#snc_notification_unsubscribe {
		text-decoration: none;
	}
</style>

</head><body><p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">Hello <strong>Networking Operations Team!</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">A new <strong>Critical Priority Network Incident</strong> was c</span><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">reated on <strong>2025-08-01 10:02:09 UTC.</strong></span></span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">Currently the&nbsp;<strong>State</strong> is<strong> </strong>New<strong>&nbsp;</strong>and&nbsp;<strong>Category&nbsp;</strong>is Network.</span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<ol style="list-style-position: inside; list-style-type: upper-alpha;">
<li style="font-size: 12pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><strong>Priority</strong>: 1 - Critical<br></span></li>
<li style="font-size: 12pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><strong>Impact</strong>: 1 - High</span></li>
<li style="font-size: 12pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><strong>Urgency</strong>: 1 - High</span></li>
</ol>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><strong>Caller</strong></span>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">Alejandro Mascall, , alejandro.mascall@example.com, Frankfurt</span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="text-decoration: underline; font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica;"><strong><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-decoration: underline;">Description</span></strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">Something is up with the connections between our vendor menus and the Uber Eats UI. None of the current prices are showing, but the vendors have said everything is the same for them. </span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">--------------------------------------------</span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">Thank you for your timely attention to this matter. </span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">We appreciate your contributions towards improving Uber!</span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">Sincerely,</span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><strong>Uber IT Ops Team</strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><img src="https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/c/cc/Uber_logo_2018.png" alt="File:Uber logo 2018.png - Wikimedia Commons" width="83" height="29"></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<br><br>

<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">A new <strong>Critical Priority Network Incident</strong> was c</span><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">reated on <strong>2025-08-01 10:40:12 UTC.</strong></span></span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">Currently the&nbsp;<strong>State</strong> is<strong> </strong>New<strong>&nbsp;</strong>and&nbsp;<strong>Category&nbsp;</strong>is Network.</span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<ol style="list-style-position: inside; list-style-type: upper-alpha;">
<li style="font-size: 12pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><strong>Priority</strong>: 1 - Critical<br></span></li>
<li style="font-size: 12pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><strong>Impact</strong>: 1 - High</span></li>
<li style="font-size: 12pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><strong>Urgency</strong>: 1 - High</span></li>
</ol>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><strong>Caller</strong></span>&nbsp;</span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">Bess Marso, Infrastructure Analyst, bess.marso@example.com, Frankfurt</span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="text-decoration: underline; font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica;"><strong><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-decoration: underline;">Description</span></strong></span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">Theres a terrible outage in the exec suite and they are having a yearly fiscal planning meeting. Can we get someone here immediately to resolve this issue. Please please please and thank you!</span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">--------------------------------------------</span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">Thank you for your timely attention to this matter. </span><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">We appreciate your contributions towards improving Uber!</span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">Sincerely,</span></p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);"><strong>Uber IT Ops Team</strong></span></p>
